Data Structures | Enumerations | Functions | Variables
LPS22HH I3C Pressure/Temperature Sensor Driver
devices

Detailed Description

Purpose: This module provides a comprehensive hardware abstraction layer for the ST Microelectronics LPS22HH digital barometric pressure sensor. The driver enables high-precision atmospheric pressure and temperature measurement through the I3C interface. It supports advanced features including configurable output data rates, pressure and temperature data acquisition, I3C Common Command Codes (CCC) for dynamic addressing, and efficient data management for environmental sensing applications.

Key Features

  1. High-Precision Pressure Sensor: 24-bit pressure data with excellent accuracy.
  2. Temperature Sensor: Integrated temperature measurement for compensation.
  3. I3C Interface: High-speed digital communication with CCC support.
  4. Dynamic Addressing: I3C SETDASA and RSTDAA command support.
  5. Configurable ODR: Multiple output data rates from 1Hz to 200Hz.
  6. Low Power Modes: Optimized power consumption for battery applications.
  7. FIFO Support: Internal FIFO buffer for data buffering and batch processing.
  8. DMA Support: Efficient data transfer with timeout and callback mechanisms.

Functionality

  • Initialize and configure LPS22HH pressure sensor via I3C interface
  • Read high-precision pressure data in Pascal units
  • Read temperature data for environmental monitoring and sensor compensation
  • Configure sensor output data rates and operating modes
  • Handle I3C Common Command Codes for device management
  • Support dynamic I3C address assignment and reset operations
  • Provide device identification and status monitoring
  • Manage I3C read/write length limitations with SETMWL/SETMRL commands
  • Support register-level read/write operations for advanced configuration

Usage

  1. Initialize I3C host interface and configure I3C module
  2. Initialize LPS22HH device with am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_init()
  3. Configure sensor parameters (ODR, operating modes) through device_init
  4. Read device ID to verify communication and device presence
  5. Read pressure data with am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_get_pressure()
  6. Read temperature data with am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_get_temperature()
  7. Use register access functions for advanced configuration
  8. Monitor device status and handle data availability flags
  9. Terminate device with am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_term() when finished

Configuration

  • Set up I3C interface parameters and timing
  • Configure pressure sensor output data rate and operating mode
  • Set up I3C dynamic addressing and device provisioning
  • Configure DMA parameters for efficient data transfer
  • Set up FIFO configurations for data buffering
  • Configure interrupt settings for data ready notifications
  • Optimize power consumption through ODR and low-power modes

enum  am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_odr_t {
  AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_POWER_DOWN = 0x00 ,
  AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_ONE_SHOOT = 0x08 ,
  AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_1_Hz = 0x01 ,
  AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_10_Hz = 0x02 ,
  AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_25_Hz = 0x03 ,
  AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_50_Hz = 0x04 ,
  AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_75_Hz = 0x05 ,
  AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_1_Hz_LOW_NOISE = 0x11 ,
  AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_10_Hz_LOW_NOISE = 0x12 ,
  AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_25_Hz_LOW_NOISE = 0x13 ,
  AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_50_Hz_LOW_NOISE = 0x14 ,
  AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_75_Hz_LOW_NOISE = 0x15 ,
  AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_100_Hz = 0x06 ,
  AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_200_Hz = 0x07
}

Function Documentation

◆ am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_get_pressure()

uint32_t am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_get_pressure ( void * pHandle,
float32_t * pData )

Get the pressure from lps22hh sensor.

Parameters
pHandle- Pointer to device handle
pData- The actual pressure data detected by sensor

This function read data from the sensor pressure registers, and caculate the pressure data based on registers data.

Returns
32-bit status

Get the temperature from lps22hh sensor.

Parameters
pHandle- Pointer to device handle
pData- The actual temperature data detected by sensor

This function read data from the sensor temperature registers, and caculate the temperature data based on registers data.

Returns
32-bit status

◆ am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_init()

uint32_t am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_init ( uint32_t ui32Module,
void * pI3cHandle,
void ** ppDevHandle,
am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_config_t * pDevConfig )

Initialize the lps22hh driver.

Initialize the lps22hh sensor.

Parameters
ui32Module- I3C instance
pI3cHandle- I3C controller handle
ppDevHandle- Device handle which needs to be return
pDevConfig- I3C device structure describing the target sensor
Note
This function should be called before any other am_devices_i3c_lps22hh functions. It is used to tell the other functions how to communicate with the other I3C sensors.
Returns
Status.
Parameters
ui32Module- I3C instance
pI3cHandle- I3C controller handle
ppDevHandle- Device handle which needs to be return
pDevConfig- I3C device structure describing the target sensor
Note
This function should be called before any other am_devices_i3c_lps22hh functions. It is used to tell the other functions how to communicate with the I3C sensors.
Returns
Status.

◆ am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_read_reg()

uint32_t am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_read_reg ( void * pHandle,
uint8_t ui8SubAddress,
uint32_t * pData,
uint32_t ui32NumBytes )

Read generic device register from lps22hh sensor.

Parameters
pHandle- Pointer to device handle
ui8SubAddress- Address of desired data in sensor
pData- Buffer to store the received data from sensor
ui32NumBytes- Number of bytes to read from sensor

This function read data from the given register of sensor, and returns the result as an 32-bit unsigned integer value.

Returns
32-bit status

◆ am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_send_cccs()

uint32_t am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_send_cccs ( void * pHandle,
uint32_t * pui32Data,
uint8_t ui8CccId )

Send I3C Common Command Codes.

Parameters
pHandle- Pointer to device handle
pui32Data- Buffer to config sensor or save current configuration
ui8CccId- Common command code index

This function sends I3C CCCs to sensor to configure or get sensor information

Returns
32-bit status

◆ am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_term()

uint32_t am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_term ( void * pHandle)

De-Initialize the lps22hh driver.

Parameters
pHandle- Pointer to device handle

This function reverses the initialization

Returns
Status.

◆ am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_write_reg()

uint32_t am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_write_reg ( void * pHandle,
uint8_t ui8SubAddress,
uint32_t * pData,
uint32_t ui32NumBytes )

Write generic device register of lps22hh sensor.

Parameters
pHandle- Pointer to device handle
ui8SubAddress- Address of desired data in sensor
pData- Buffer to write the sensor data from
ui32NumBytes- Number of bytes to write to sensor

This function write data to the given register of sensor, and returns the result as an 32-bit unsigned integer value.

Returns
32-bit status
